title: Donger turret glitch
body: During this game when I was playing donger after I think about 40 to 50 minutes in the game I placed three mini turrets around a "normal" turret u know the large stone turret. After a few minutes when we entered a small team fight i died to illaoi cause she is broken( jk I am just shit at the game), after I respawn I went back to my turrets which somehow weren't destroyed. The turrets started attacking minions that were in range of their radius, although strange enough the third turret started to attack illaoi even tho she is way out of range (illaoi is still alive...). This is hard to believe since well it's sounds be but it happened to me. I was wondering if u guys have any strange bugs or glitch happening to u.

replies.body: they don't damage or follow through fog of war so its not that big of a deal

Ah, it's a common and well-known glitch that has been occurring for some time, but if you'd like to report it to Riot, you can do so on the Report a Bug sub-boards, linked below. Cheers!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report
